sentence: The measure is headed to the desk of Governor Brian Kemp, a Republican.
author: Maria Caspani
title: Factbox-The Onslaught Of U.S. Laws Targeting Transgender Youth

sentence: The Strike Force includes Governors Kay Ivey (AL), Mike Dunleavy (AK), Asa Hutchinson (AR), Ron DeSantis (FL), Brian Kemp (GA), Brad Little (ID), Eric Holcomb (IN), Kim Reynolds (IA), Larry Hogan (MD), Tate Reeves (MS), Mike Parson (MO), Greg Gianforte (MT), Pete Ricketts (NE), Chris Sununu (NH), Doug Burgum (ND), Mike DeWine (OH), Kevin Stitt (OK), Henry McMaster (SC), Kristi Noem (SD), Bill Lee (TN), Spencer Cox (UT), Glenn Youngkin (VA), Jim Justice (WV), and Mark Gordon (WY).

sentence: Georgia GOP candidate David Perdue promised to call a special session of the legislature to consider an abortion ban, while incumbent Republican Brian Kemp said he would fight for the strongest antiabortion law in the country.
author: Jennifer Calfas
title: States Move to Restrict or Protect Abortion Rights After Leak of Draft Opinion Overturning Roe v. Wade
